welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Roxbury, a charming and historic city known for its rich cultural heritage and vibrant community. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Municipal Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including a restaurant, gift shop, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: For those traveling on private or chartered flights, Caldwell Wright Airport offers a dedicated private terminal with luxurious amenities and VIP services.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Linden Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Terminal A is the oldest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving primarily domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Terminal B is the largest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Terminal C is the newest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving primarily United Airlines flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free Wi-Fi network for up to 45 minutes per session.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Teterboro Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Teterboro Airport is exclusively for private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
